item.name: Hall Mirror
item.description: This white oak mirror has 4 brass coat hooks and is 19 inches high by 32 inches wide.

item.name: Hall Mirror
item.description: This elegant hall mirror is made of red oak and has a bottom shelf. It is 26 inches wide by 44 inches tall and is shown with a custom decorative mirror.

item.name: Clock
item.description: A clock with railroad images that can be made from oak or walnut and is 12" tall.

item.name: Sports Clock
item.description: These sports clocks are made of walnut and maple with quartz movements. They are 8 inches in diameter and are available for various sports.

item.name: Plant or Fern Stand
item.description: This storage column is perfect for the media enthusiast and can hold up to 45 cd's. This can be made from several types of wood, and is shown in oak.

item.name: Plate Rack
item.description: This plate rack is perfect for filling your wall space with your favourite collectible plates. Our plate racks are made of oak and sized to fit your space.

item.name: Water Cabinet
item.description: This pine cabinet works well for holding the water dispenser and has room for a spare water container below.

item.name: Chair-Step Ladder
item.description: The chair-step ladder works great in the kitchen, to reach those hard to get to places. Folded down it makes a extra chair, shown in oak with the family initial carved in the crest rail.

item.name: Cottage Sign
item.description: A hand carved sign for the cottage or home. Painted to match the colours of the cottage and mounted on a cedar post.
